com.marklogic.hub.deploy.commands

Class DeployHubDatabaseCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marklogic.client.ext.helper.LoggingObject
      • com.marklogic.appdeployer.command.AbstractCommand
        • com.marklogic.appdeployer.command.databases.DeployDatabaseCommand
          • com.marklogic.hub.deploy.commands.DeployHubDatabaseCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.marklogic.appdeployer.command.Command, com.marklogic.appdeployer.command.UndoableCommand
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DeployHubSchemasDatabaseCommand, DeployHubTriggersDatabaseCommand

    public class DeployHubDatabaseCommand
extends com.marklogic.appdeployer.command.databases.DeployDatabaseCommand
    Can be used for creating any kind of database with any sorts of forests. Specifying a config file for the database or for the forests is optional. In order to create forests with different parameters, use DeployForestsCommand.
